content: hi, im trying to find the definition of by_contra but i can't seem to find it. firstly, the tactic doesn't work if i don't import Mathlib.Tactic, so i think it's not on the lean standard library. secondly, in the docs i could only find the definition of by_contra! in mathlib4/Mathlib/Tactic /ByContra.lean but not the regular one. appreciate if anyone could help me with this!
Hitting F12 on a use site jumps to .lake/packages/batteries/Batteries/Tactic/Init.lean
